DOC.brief_summary: To compare the positivity rate of the investigational assay to the currently approved QuantiFERON-TB Gold In-Tube assay.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the 4th Generation QuantiFERON-TB Test (QFT-Plus) for the Detection of Tuberculosis Infection
DOC.criteria: Low Risk and Known Risk Cohorts Compensated and uncompensated members (current or future) of the Department of Veterans Affairs with no identified symptoms of active TB disease Age greater than 18 years or less than 80 years. Currently taking therapy for active tuberculosis or latent TB infection for more than 14 days.
